definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: trader, merchant (cf. II. [[כְּנַעַן]]); only sg. (but v. infr.):—[[עוֹד]] ´[[וְלאׁ יִהְיֶה כ]]´[[בְּבֵית י]] Zec 14:21 (prob.); ´[[וַחֲגוֹר נׇֽתְנׇה לַכּ]] Pr 31:24 (‖[[סָדִין עָֽשְׂתָה וַתִּמְכּׂר]]). In Zec 11:7, Zec 11:11 rd. perh. [[כְנַעֲנִיֵּי]]([[לִ]]) for [[כֵן עֲנִיֵּי]]([[לָ]]), LXX Xananai=oi, Xanaani=tin, Sta:ZAW, 1881. 26 (who comp. as to sense Ho 12:8), cf. Klo We Marti.
